body_content.explanation: relating to the Apostles (= the group of early Christians who travelled to different places telling people about Jesus Christ):
examples: The once united apostolic church splintered over issues of power, governance, and doctrine.
These people had a deeply apostolic and missionary spirit.

body_content.explanation: relating to the authority of the Pope (= the leader of the Roman Catholic Church), especially when this is seen as coming from St. Peter or the Apostles:
examples: The apostolic nuncio is the Pope's ambassador.
The cardinal was appointed an apostolic administrator.
